description: Technical debt payoff and best-practice hardening for long-term maintainability and AI-friendly refactors.

userStories.title: Create tech-debt register
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I need a single place to track remaining technical debt with owners and risk.
acceptanceCriteria: Each item includes impact, owner, and suggested fix

userStories.title: Eliminate jest open-handle warnings
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want test runs to exit cleanly.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify top 2 sources of open-handle warnings
Fix teardown or add proper cleanup
npm run test passes without open-handle warning
userStories.notes: Do not mask warnings; fix root cause.

userStories.title: Reduce noisy test console errors
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want tests to be signal-rich with minimal noise.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove or gate known noisy console.error in 2 test suites

userStories.title: Normalize Jest setup and matchers
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a single shared Jest setup with consistent matchers.
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure all projects use the same setup file

userStories.title: Audit and trim unused dependencies
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want to reduce dependency surface area.
acceptanceCriteria: npm run lint and npm run test pass
userStories.notes: Use minimal removal; no breaking changes.

userStories.title: Standardize configuration access
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want all services using env-validator accessors.
userStories.notes: Incremental; no new required envs if avoidable.

userStories.title: Strengthen module boundaries enforcement
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want tighter layer rules with fewer exceptions.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove at least one boundary exception

userStories.title: Refactor one large service to smaller units
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want services under 500 lines where possible.
acceptanceCriteria: Split one service into helper/service files
Add unit tests for extracted parts

userStories.title: Refactor one large frontend component
userStories.description: As a frontend maintainer, I want UI components under size limits.
acceptanceCriteria: Split one component into container + presentational

userStories.title: Document integration test pattern and apply to one service
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want a consistent integration test structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Refactor one service’s integration tests to match

userStories.title: Consolidate shared DTO structure
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I want DTOs organized by domain for clarity.
acceptanceCriteria: Reorganize one domain’s DTOs under libs/shared-dtos

userStories.title: Standardize logging with shared logger wrapper
userStories.description: As ops, I want consistent log format and metadata.
acceptanceCriteria: Add shared logger wrapper in libs/infrastructure-shared

userStories.title: Finalize full local verification
userStories.description: As a maintainer, I need a full green local run before PR.
